item.title: GitLab
GitLab Integration Examples
item.description: Example 1. Scan from the cloud using the Bright CLI (NPM installation) To apply this option, you only need to install the «glossary:Bright CLI» globally on your GitLab machine using the relative NPM command. Prerequisites You have a valid organization API key or personal API key (BRIGHT_TOKEN) with the following scopes: bot, scans : run,scan : read, and scans : stop. You have set the BRIGHT_TOKEN variable in your GitLab pipeline: Settings > CI/CD > Variables.
